words.id: wahai||Nabi||bertakwalah||Allah||dan jangan||kamu mentaati||orang-orang kafir||dan orang-orang munafik||sesungguhnya||Allah||adalah||Maha Mengetahui||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: O (Prophet)||(O) Prophet||Fear||Allah||and (do) not||obey||the disbelievers||and the hypocrites||Indeed||Allah||is||All-Knower||All-Wise

translations.text: Yaa-aiyuhan Nabiyyut taqil laaha Wa-laa tuti'il kaafireena wal-munaafiqeen; innal laaha kaana 'aleeman Hakeemaa

words.id: dan ikutilah||apa yang||diwahyukan||kepadamu||dari||Tuhanmu||sesungguhnya||Allah||adalah||tentang apa||kamu kerjakan||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: And follow||what||is inspired||to you||from||your Lord||Indeed||Allah||is||of what||you do||All-Aware

translations.text: Wattabi' maa yoohaaa ilaika mir Rabbik; innal laaha kaana bimaa ta'maloona Khabeera

words.id: dan bertawakallah||kepada||Allah||dan cukuplah||dengan Allah||tempat mempercayakan diri/pemelihara
words.en: And put your trust||in||Allah||And Allah is sufficient||And Allah is sufficient||(as) Disposer of affairs

translations.text: Wa-tawakkal 'alal laah; Wa-kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa

words.id: tidak||menjadikan||Allah||bagi seorang laki-laki||dari||dua hati||dalam||lambungnya||dan tidak||Dia menjadikan||isteri-isterimu||yang||kamu nyatakan||dari pada mereka||ibu-ibu kamu||dan tidak||Dia menjadikan||anak angkatmu||anak-anak laki-laki kalian||demikian itu||perkataanmu||dengan mulutmu||dan Allah||mengatakan||benar||dan Dia||memberi petunjuk||jalan
words.en: Not||Allah (has) made||Allah (has) made||for any man||[of]||two hearts||in||his interior||And not||He (has) made||your wives||whom||you declare unlawful||[of them]||(as) your mothers||And not||He has made||your adopted sons||your sons||That||(is) your saying||by your mouths||but Allah||says||the truth||and He||guides||(to) the Way

translations.text: Maa ja'alal laahu lirajulim min qalbaini fee jawfih; Wa-maa ja'ala azwaajakumul laaa'ee tuzaahiroona minhunna ummahaatikum; Wa-maa ja'ala ad'iyaaa'akum abnaaa'akum; zaalikum qawlukum bi-afwaa-hikum wallaahu yaqoolul haqqa Wa-Huwa yahdis sabeel

words.id: panggillah mereka||dengan bapak-bapak mereka||hal itu||lebih adil||di sisi||Allah||maka jika||tidak||kamu mengetahui||bapak-bapak mereka||maka saudaramu||dalam||agama||dan maulana-maulanamu||dan tidak||atas kalian||berdosa||dalam hal||kamu membuat kesalahan||dengannya||tetapi||apa yang||sengaja||hati-hati kamu||dan adalah||Allah||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: Call them||by their fathers||it||(is) more just||near||Allah||But if||not||you know||their fathers||then (they are) your brothers||in||[the] religion||and your friends||But not is||upon you||any blame||in what||you made a mistake||in it||but||what||intended||your hearts||And Allah||And Allah||(is) Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Ud'oohum li-aabaaa'ihim huwa aqsatu indal laah; fa-il lam ta'lamooo aabaaa'ahum fa-ikhwaanukum fid deeni Wa-mawaaleekum; Wa-laisa alaikum junaahun feemaaa akhtaatum bihee Wa-laakim maa ta'ammadat quloobukum; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

words.id: Nabi itu||lebih utama||dengan orang-orang mukmin||dari||diri mereka sendiri||dan isteri-isterinya||ibu-ibu mereka||dan yang mempunyai||hubungan darah||sebagian mereka||lebih utama||dengan sebagian||dalam||kitab||Allah||dari||orang-orang mukmin||dan orang-orang muhajirin||kecuali||bahwa||kalian kerjakan||kepada||saudara-saudara kamu||kebaikan||adalah||demikian itu||dalam||kitab||yang tertulis
words.en: The Prophet||(is) closer||to the believers||than||their own selves||and his wives||(are) their mothers||And possessors||(of) relationships||some of them||(are) closer||to another||in||(the) Decree||(of) Allah||than||the believers||and the emigrants||except||that||you do||to||your friends||a kindness||That is||That is||in||the Book||written

translations.text: An-Nabiyyu awlaa bil-mu'mineena min anfusihim Wa-azwaajuhoo ummahatuhum Wa-ulul arhaami ba'duhum awlaa biba'din fee Kitaabil laahi minal mu'meneena wal-Muhaajireena illaaa an taf'alooo ilaaa awliyaaa'ikum ma'roofaa; kaana zaalika fil kitaabi mastooraa

words.id: dan ketika||Kami mengambil||dari||Nabi-nabi||perjanjian mereka||dan dari kamu||dan dari||Nuh||dan Ibrahim||dan Musa||dan 'Isa||putra||Maryam||dan Kami telah mengambil||dari mereka||perjanjian||yang teguh
words.en: And when||We took||from||the Prophets||their Covenant||and from you||and from||Nuh||and Ibrahim||and Musa||and Isa||son||(of) Maryam||And We took||from them||a covenant||strong

translations.text: Wa-iz akhaznaa minan Nabiyyeena meesaaqahum Wa-minka Wa-min Noohinw Wa-ibraaheema Wa-Moosaa Wa-Eesab ni Maryama Wa-akhaznaa minhum meesaaqan ghaleezaa

words.id: karena Dia akan menanyakan||orang-orang yang benar||dari/tentang||kebenaran mereka||dan Dia menyediakan||bagi orang-orang kafir||azab||pedih
words.en: That He may ask||the truthful||about||their truth||And He has prepared||for the disbelievers||a punishment||painful

translations.text: Liyas'alas saadiqeena 'an sidqihim; Wa-a'adda lilkaa-fireena 'azaaban aleemaa

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||ingatlah||nikmat||Allah||atas kalian||jika||datang kepadamu||bala tentara||lalu Kami kirimkan||kepada mereka||angin topan||dan bala tentara||tidak||kamu melihatnya||dan adalah||Allah||dengan apa||kamu kerjakan||Maha Melihat
words.en: O you||who||believe||Remember||(the) Favor||(of) Allah||upon you||when||came to you||(the) hosts||and We sent||upon them||a wind||and hosts||not||you (could) see them||And Allah is||And Allah is||of what||you do||All-Seer

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanuz kuroo ni'matal laahi alaikum iz jaaa'atkum junoodun fa-arsalnaa alaihim reehanw Wa-junoodal lam tarawhaa; Wa-kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseera

words.id: tatkala||mereka datang kepadamu||dari||atasmu||dan dari||bawah||dari kamu||dan ketika||berobah||pandangan||dan sampai||hati||tenggorokkan||dan kamu menyangka||terhadap Allah||persangkaan yang salah
words.en: When||they came upon you||from||above you||and from||below||you||and when||grew wild||the eyes||and reached||the hearts||the throats||and you assumed||about Allah||the assumptions

translations.text: iz jaaa'ookum min fawqikum Wa-min asfala minkum Wa-iz zaaghatil absaaru Wa-balaghatil quloobul hanaajira Wa-tazunnoona billaahiz zunoonaa

words.id: disitulah||di uji||orang-orang mukmin||dan mereka digoncangkan||goncangan||keras
words.en: There||were tried||the believers||and shaken||(with a) shake||severe

translations.text: Hunaalikab tuliyal mu'minoona Wa-zulziloo zilzaalan shadeedaa

words.id: dan ketika||berkata||orang-orang munafik||dan orang-orang yang||dalam||hati mereka||berpenyakit||tidak||menjanjikan kepada kami||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||kecuali||tipuan
words.en: And when||said||the hypocrites||and those||in||their hearts||(was) a disease||Not||Allah promised us||Allah promised us||and His messenger||except||delusion

translations.text: Wa-iz yaqoolul munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradum maa wa'adanal laahu Wa-Rasooluhooo illaa ghurooraa

words.id: dan ketika||berkata||segolongan||dari mereka||hai orang||Yasrib||tidak||tempat||bagi kalian||maka kembalilah||dan meminta izin||segolongan||dari mereka||Nabi||mereka berkata||sesungguhnya||rumah-rumah kami||terbuka||dan tidak||padahal ia||dengan terbuka||bahwa||mereka hendak||hanyalah||lari
words.en: And when||said||a party||of them||O People||(of) Yathrib!||No||stand||for you||so return||And asked permission||a group||of them||(from) the Prophet||saying||Indeed||our houses||(are) exposed||and not||they||(were) exposed||Not||they wished||but||to flee

translations.text: Wa-iz qaalat taaa'ifatum minhum yaaa-ahla Yasriba laa muqaamaa lakum farji'oo; Wa-yastaazinu fareequm minhumun Nabiyya yaqooloona inna buyootanaa 'awrah; Wa-maa hiya bi'awratin iny yureedoona illaa firaaraa

words.id: dan kalau||di serang||atas mereka||dari||segala penjurunya||kemudian||mereka diminta||berkhianat||niscaya mereka mengerjakan||dan tidak||mereka menangguhkan||dengannya||kecuali||segera
words.en: And if||had been entered||upon them||from||all its sides||then||they had been asked||the treachery||they (would) have certainly done it||and not||they (would) have hesitated||over it||except||a little

translations.text: wa-law dukhilat alaihim min aqtaarihaa summa su'ilul fitnata la-aatawhaa Wa-maa talabbasoo bihaaa illaa yaseeraa

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||adalah mereka||mereka berjanji||Allah||dari||sebelum itu||tidak||mereka berpaling||kebelakang||dan adalah||janji||Allah||ditanya
words.en: And certainly||they had||promised||Allah||before||before||not||they would turn||their backs||And is||(the) promise||(to) Allah||to be questioned

translations.text: Wa-laqad kaanoo 'aahadul laaha min qablu laa yuwal-loonal adbaar; Wa-kaana 'ahdul laahi mas'oolaa

words.id: katakanlah||tidaklah||berguna bagi kamu||lari itu||jika||kamu lari||dari||kematian||atau||pembunuhan||jika demikian||tidak||kamu bersenang-senang||kecuali||sedikit/sebentar
words.en: Say||Never||will benefit you||the fleeing||if||you flee||from||death||or||killing||and then||not||you will be allowed to enjoy||except||a little

translations.text: Qul laien yanfa'akumul firaaru in farartum minal mawti awil qatli Wa-izal laa tumatta'oona illaa qaleelaa

words.id: katakanlah||barang siapa||mempunyai||yang||melindungi kamu||dari||Allah||jika||Dia menghendaki||dengan/untuk kalian||kejelekan/bencana||atau||Dia menghendaki||dengan/untuk kalian||rahmat||dan tidak||mereka memperoleh||bagi mereka||dari||selain||Allah||pelindung||dan tidak||penolong
words.en: Say||Who||(is) it that||(is) it that||(can) protect you||from||Allah||If||He intends||for you||any harm||or||He intends||for you||a mercy||And not||they will find||for them||besides||besides||Allah||any protector||and not||any helper

translations.text: Qul man zal lazee ya'simukum minal laahi in araada bikum sooo'an aw araada bikum rahmah; Wa-laa yajidoona lahum min doonil laahi waliyyanw Wa-laa naseeraa

words.id: sesungguhnya||mengetahui||Allah||orang-orang yang merintangi||diantara kamu||dan orang yang berkata||kepada saudara-saudara mereka||marilah||kepada kami||dan tidak||mendatangi mereka||peperangan||kecuali||sedikit/sebentar
words.en: Verily||Allah knows||Allah knows||those who hinder||among you||and those who say||to their brothers||Come||to us||and not||they come||(to) the battle||except||a few

translations.text: Qad ya'lamul laahul mu'awwiqeena minkum walqaaa'ileena li-ikhwaanihim halumma ilainaa, Wa-laa yaatoonal baasa illaa qaleelaa

words.id: kikir||atas kalian||maka apabila||datang||ketakutan||kamu melihat mereka||mereka memandang||kepadamu||berputar-putar||mata mereka||seperti orang yang||ditutupi (pingsan)||atasnya||dari||mati||maka apabila||telah pergi/hilang||ketakutan||mereka mencaci maki kamu||dengan lisan||tajam||kikir||atas||kebaikan||mereka itu||tidak||mereka beriman||maka menghapus||Allah||amal perbuatan mereka||dan adalah||demikian itu||atas||Allah||mudah
words.en: Miserly||towards you||But when||comes||the fear||you see them||looking||at you||revolving||their eyes||like one who||faints||faints||from||[the] death||But when||departs||the fear||they smite you||with tongues||sharp||miserly||towards||the good||Those||not||they have believed||so Allah made worthless||so Allah made worthless||their deeds||And is||that||for||Allah||easy

translations.text: Ashihhatan alaikum faizaa jaaa'al khawfu ra-aytahum yanzuroona ilaika tadooru a'yunuhum kallazee yughshaa alaihi minal mawti fa-izaa zahabal khawfu salqookum bi-alsinatin hidaadin ashih-hatan 'alal khayr; ulaaa'ika lam yu'minoo fa-ahbatal laahu a'maalahum; Wa-kaana zaalika 'alal laahi yaseeraa

words.id: mereka mengira||golongan-golongan||tidak||mereka pergi||dan jika||datang||golongan-golongan||mereka menginginkan||sekiranya||bahwasanya mereka||mereka mengembara||dalam||orang-orang dusun||mereka menanyakan||diri/tentang||beritamu||dan sekiranya||adalah mereka||pada/bersamamu||tidak||mereka berperang||kecuali||sedikit/sebentar
words.en: They think||the confederates||(have) not||withdrawn||And if||(should) come||the confederates||they would wish||if||that they (were)||living in (the) desert||among||the Bedouins||asking||about||your news||And if||they were||among you||not||they would fight||except||a little

translations.text: Yahsaboonal Ahzaaba lam yazhaboo Wa-ien yaatil Ahzaabu yawaddoo law annahum baadoona fil A'raabi yasaloona 'an ambaaa'ikum Wa-law kaanoo feekum maa qaatalooo illaa qaleela

words.id: sesungguhnya||adalah kamu||bagi kalian||dalam/pada||rasul||Allah||teladan||baik||bagi orang||adalah||mengharap||Allah||dan hari||akhir||dan mengingat||Allah||banyak
words.en: Certainly||is||for you||in||(the) Messenger||(of) Allah||an excellent example||an excellent example||for (one) who||has||hope||(in) Allah||and the Day||the Last||and remembers||Allah||much

translations.text: Laqad kaana lakum fee Rasoolil laahi uswatun hasanatul liman kaana yarjul laaha wal-yawmal Aakhira Wa-zakaral laaha kaseeraa

words.id: dan tatkala||melihat||orang-orang mukmin||golongan||berkata mereka||ini||apa||telah menjanjikan kepada kita||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||dan benarlah||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||dan tidak||menambah mereka||kecuali||keimanan||dan penyerahan diri
words.en: And when||saw||the believers||the confederates||they said||This||(is) what||Allah promised us||Allah promised us||and His Messenger||and Allah spoke the truth||and Allah spoke the truth||and His Messenger||And not||it increased them||except||(in) faith||and submission

translations.text: Wa-lammaa ra al-mu'minoonal Ahzaaba qaaloo haazaa maa wa'adanal laahu Wa-Rasooluh; Wa-sadaqal laahu Wa-Rasooluh; Wa-maa zaadahum illaaa eemaananw Wa-tasleemaa

words.id: dari||orang-orang beriman||laki-laki||mereka benar (menepati)||apa||yang mereka janjikan||Allah||atasnya||maka diantara mereka||orang||telah sampai||waktu kematiannya||dan diantara mereka||orang||menunggu||dan tidak||mereka merubah||perubahan
words.en: Among||the believers||(are) men||(who) have been true||(to) what||they promised Allah||they promised Allah||[on it]||And among them||(is he) who||has fulfilled||his vow||and among them||(is he) who||awaits||And not||they alter||(by) any alteration

translations.text: Minal mu'mineena rijaalun sadaqoo maa 'aahadul laaha alaihi faminhum man qadaa nahbahoo Wa-minhum mai yantaziru Wa-maa baddaloo tabdeelaa

words.id: karena hendak memberi balasan||Allah||orang-orang yang benar||dengan kebenaran mereka||dan Dia menyiksa||orang-orang munafik||jika||menghendaki||atau||Dia menerima taubat||atas mereka||sesungguhnya||Allah||adalah||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: That Allah may reward||That Allah may reward||the truthful||for their truth||and punish||the hypocrites||if||He wills||or||turn in mercy||to them||Indeed||Allah||is||Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Li-yajziyal aahus saadiqeena bisidqihim Wa-yu'azzibal munaafiqeena in shaaa'a aw yatooba alaihim; innal laaha kaana Ghafoorar Raheemaa

words.id: dan menolak/menghalau||Allah||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dengan kemarahan/kejengkelan mereka||tidak||mereka memperoleh||kebaikan||dan cukuplah||Allah||orang-orang mukmin||peperangan||dan adalah||Allah||Maha Kuat||Maha Perkasa
words.en: And Allah turned back||And Allah turned back||those who||disbelieved||in their rage||not||they obtained||any good||And sufficient is||Allah||(for) the believers||(in) the battle||and Allah is||and Allah is||All-Strong||All-Mighty

translations.text: Wa-raddal laahul lazeena kafaroo bighaizihim lam yanaaloo khairaa; Wa-kafal laahul mu'mineenal qitaal; Wa-kaanal laahu Qawiyyan 'Azeezaa

words.id: dan Dia menurunkan||orang-orang yang||membantu mereka||dari||ahli||kitab||dari||benteng-benteng mereka||dan Dia memasukkan||pada||hati mereka||rasa takut||sebagian||kamu membunuh||dan kamu menawan||sebagian
words.en: And He brought down||those who||backed them||among||(the) People||(of) the Scripture||from||their fortresses||and cast||into||their hearts||[the] terror||a group||you killed||and you took captive||a group

translations.text: Wa-anzalal lazeena zaaha-roohum min Ahlil Kitaabi min sa-yaaseehim Wa-qazafa fee quloobihimm mur-ru'ba fareeqan taqtuloona Wa-taasiroona fareeqaaa

words.id: dan Dia mewariskan kepadamu||bumi mereka||dan rumah-rumah mereka||dan harta benda mereka||dan bumi/tanah||tidak||kamu menginjaknya||dan adalah||Allah||atas||segala||sesuatu||berkuasa
words.en: And He caused you to inherit||their land||and their houses||and their properties||and a land||not||you (had) trodden||And Allah is||And Allah is||on||every||thing||All-Powerful

translations.text: Wa-awrasakum ardahum Wa-diyaarahum Wa-amwaalahum Wa-ardal lam tata'oohaa; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeeraa

words.id: wahai||nabi||katakan||kepada istri-istrimu||jika||kamu sekalian||kamu menghendaki||kehidupan||dunia||dan perhiasannya||maka marilah||akan aku berikan mut'ah kepadamu||dan akan aku ceraikan kamu||perceraian||yang baik
words.en: O Prophet||O Prophet||Say||to your wives||If||you||desire||the life||(of) the world||and its adornment||then come||I will provide for you||and release you||(with) a release||good

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu qul li-azwaajika in kuntunna turidnal hayaatad dunyaa Wa-zeenatahaa fata'aalaina umatti'kunna Wa-usarrihkunna saraahan jameela

words.id: dan jika||kamu adalah||kamu menghendaki||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||dan kampung||akhirat||maka sesungguhnya||Allah||menyediakan||bagi orang-orang yang berbuat baik||diantara kamu||pahala||yang besar
words.en: But if||you||desire||Allah||and His Messenger||and the Home||(of) the Hereafter||then indeed||Allah||has prepared||for the good-doers||among you||a reward||great

translations.text: Wa-in kuntunna turidnal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo wad-Daaral Aakhirata fa-innal laaha a'adda lil-muhsinaati min-kunna ajjran 'azeemaa

words.id: hai isteri-isteri||nabi||siapa||mendatangkan/mengerjakan||diantara kamu||dengan perbuatan keji||yang nyata||dilipat gandakan||baginya/kepadanya||siksaan||dua kali lipat||dan adalah||demikian itu||atas||Allah||mudah
words.en: O wives||(of) the Prophet||Whoever||commits||from you||immorality||clear||will be doubled||for her||the punishment||two fold||And that is||And that is||for||Allah||easy

translations.text: Yaa-nisaaa'an Nabiyyi maien yaati minkunna bifaa-hishatim mubaiyyinatien yudaa'af lahal 'azaabu di'faini Wa-kaana zaalika 'alal laahi yaseera

words.id: dan siapa||taat/patuh||diantara kamu sekalian||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||dan mengerjakan/amal||kebajikan/saleh||Kami datangkan/berikan||pahalanya||dua kali||dan Kami sediakan||baginya||rizki||mulia
words.en: And whoever||is obedient||among you||to Allah||and His Messenger||and does||righteousness||We will give her||her reward||twice||and We have prepared||for her||a provision||noble

translations.text: Wa-maien yaqnut minkunna lillaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-ta'mal saalihan nu'tihaaa ajrahaa marratayni Wa-a'tadnaa lahaa rizqan kareema

words.id: hai isteri-isteri||Nabi||tidaklah kamu||seperti seseorang||dari||wanita-wanita||jika||kamu taat/patuh||maka jangan||kamu tunduk||dengan/dalam perkataan/pembicaraan||maka (sehingga) berkeinginan||orang yang||dalam||hatinya||penyakit||dan berkatalah||perkataan||yang baik
words.en: O wives||(of) the Prophet!||You are not||like anyone||among||the women||If||you fear (Allah)||then (do) not||be soft||in speech||lest should be moved with desire||he who||in||his heart||(is) a disease||but say||a word||appropriate

translations.text: Yaa-nisaaa'an Nabiyyi lastunna ka-ahadim minan nisaaa'i init taqaitunna falaa takhda'na bilqawli fa-yatma'al lazee fee qalbihee maradunw Wa-qulna qawlam ma'roofaa

words.id: dan hendaklah kamu tetap||dalam||rumahmu||dan jangan||kamu berhias||perhiasan||orang-orang jahiliyah||pertama/dahulu||dan dirikanlah||sholat||dan tunaikanlah||zakat||dan taatilah||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||sesungguhnya||menghendaki/bermaksud||Allah||Dia hendak menghilangkan||dari kalian||kotoran/dosa||ahli/penghuni||keluarga||dan Dia akan mensucikan kamu||sesuci-sucinya
words.en: And stay||in||your houses||and (do) not||display yourselves||(as was the) display||(of the times of) ignorance||the former||And establish||the prayer||and give||zakah||and obey||Allah||and His Messenger||Only||Allah wishes||Allah wishes||to remove||from you||the impurity||(O) People||(of) the House||And to purify you||(with thorough) purification

translations.text: Wa-qarna fee bu-yoo-tikunna Wa-laa tabarrajna tabarrujal Jaahiliyyatil oolaa Wa-aqimnas Salaata Wa-aaateenaz Zakaata Wa-ati'nal laaha Wa-Rasoolah; innamaa yureedul laahu liyuzhiba 'ankumur rijsa Ahlal Bayti Wa-yutahhirakum tatheeraa

words.id: dan ingatlah||apa||yang dibacakan||pada||rumahmu||dari||ayat-ayat||Allah||dan hikmah/kebijaksanaan||sesungguhnya||Allah||adalah||Maha Halus||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: And remember||what||is recited||in||your houses||of||(the) Verses||(of) Allah||and the wisdom||Indeed||Allah||is||All-Subtle||All-Aware

translations.text: Wazkurna maa yutlaa fee bu-yootikunna min aayaatil laahi wal-Hikmah; innal laaha kaana lateefan Khabeera

words.id: sesungguhnya||laki-laki muslim||dan perempuan muslim||dan laki-laki mukmin||dan perempuan mukmin||dan laki-laki yang taat||dan perempuan-perempuan yang taat||orang laki-laki yang benar||dan perempuan yang benar||dan laki-laki yang sabar||dan perempuan-perempuan yang sabar||dan laki-laki yang khusyu'||dan perempuan yang khusyu'||dan laki-laki yang sedekah||dan perempuan-perempuan yang sedekah||dan laki-laki yang berpuasa||dan perempuan-perempuan yang berpuasa||dan laki-laki yang memelihara||kehormatan mereka||dan perempuan-perempuan yang memelihara||dan laki-laki yang mengingat||Allah||banyak||dan perempuan-perempuan yang mengingat||telah menyediakan||Allah||bagi mereka||ampunan||dan pahala||yang besar
words.en: Indeed||the Muslim men||and the Muslim women||and the believing men||and the believing women||and the obedient men||and the obedient women||and the truthful men||and the truthful women||and the patient men||and the patient women||and the humble men||and the humble women||and the men who give charity||and the women who give charity||and the men who fast||and the women who fast||and the men who guard||their chastity||and the women who guard (it)||and the men who remember||Allah||much||and the women who remember||Allah has prepared||Allah has prepared||for them||forgiveness||and a reward||great

translations.text: innal muslimeena wal-muslimaati wal-mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati walqaaniteena walqaanitaati wassaadiqeena wassaadiqaati wassaabireena wassaabiraati walkhaashi'eena walkhaashi'aati walmutasaddiqeena walmutasaddiqaati wassaaa'imeena wassaaa'imaati walhaafizeena furoojahum walhaafizaati waz-zaakireenal laaha kaseeranw waz-zaakiraati a'addal laahu lahum maghfiratanw Wa-ajran 'azeemaa

words.id: dan tidak||adalah||bagi laki-laki mukmin||dan tidak||perempuan mukmin||apabila||telah menetapkan||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||perkara||bahwa||adalah mereka||bagi mereka||pilihan||dari||perkara mereka||dan barang siapa||mendurhakai||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||maka sungguh||ia telah sesat||kesesatan||yang nyata
words.en: And not||(it) is||for a believing man||and not||(for) a believing woman||when||Allah has decided||Allah has decided||and His Messenger||a matter||that||(there) should be||for them||(any) choice||about||their affair||And whoever||disobeys||Allah||and His Messenger||certainly||he (has) strayed||(into) error||clear

translations.text: Wa-maa kaana limu'mininw Wa-laa mu'minatin izaa qadal laahu Wa-Rasooluhooo amran aien yakoona lahumul khiyaratu min amrihim; Wa-maien ya'sil laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo faqad dalla dalaalam mubeenaa

words.id: dan ketika||kamu berkata||kepada orang-orang||telah memberi ni'mat||Allah||atasnya||dan kamu telah memberi ni'mat||atasnya||tahanlah||atasmu||istrimu||dan bertakwalah||Allah||dan kamu menyembunyikan||dalam||jiwamu/hatimu||apa-apa||Allah||menyatakannya||dan kamu takut||manusia||dan Allah||lebih berhak||bahwa||kamu takuti-Nya||maka tatkala||telah memutuskan||Zaid||dari padanya||keperluan||Kami kawinkan kamu dengannya||supaya||tidak||adalah||atas||orang mukmin||keberatan||pada||istri-istri||anak angkat mereka||apabila||mereka memutuskan/menyelesaikan||diantara mereka||keperluan||dan adalah||perkara/ketetapan||Allah||dikerjakan/terjadi
words.en: And when||you said||to the one||Allah bestowed favor||Allah bestowed favor||on him||and you bestowed favor||on him||Keep||to yourself||your wife||and fear||Allah||But you concealed||within||yourself||what||Allah||(was to) disclose||And you fear||the people||while Allah||has more right||that||you (should) fear Him||So when||ended||Zaid||from her||necessary (formalities)||We married her to you||so that||not||there be||on||the believers||any discomfort||concerning||the wives||(of) their adopted sons||when||they have ended||from them||necessary (formalities)||And is||(the) Command||(of) Allah||accomplished

translations.text: Wa-iz taqoolu lillazeee an'amal laahu alaihi Wa-an'amta alaihi amsik alaika zawjaka wattaqil laaha Wa-tukhfee fee nafsika mal laahu mubdeehi Wa-takhshan naasa wallaahu ahaqqu an takhshaah; falammaa qadaa Zaidum minhaa wataran zawwajnaa-kahaa likay laa yakoona 'alal mu'mineena harajun feee azwaaji ad'iyaaa'ihim izaa qadaw minhunna wataraa; Wa-kaana amrul laahi maf'oolaa

words.id: tidak||ada||atas||nabi||dari||keberatan||dalam/tentang apa||telah menetapkan||Allah||baginya||sunnah/peraturan||Allah||pada||orang-orang yang||(mereka) berlalu||dari||sebelumnya/dahulu||dan adalah||perintah/perkara||Allah||ketetapan/keputusan||telah ditetapkan
words.en: Not||(there can) be||upon||the Prophet||any||discomfort||in what||Allah has imposed||Allah has imposed||on him||(That is the) Way||(of) Allah||concerning||those who||passed away||before||before||And is||(the) Command||(of) Allah||a decree||destined

translations.text: Maa kaana 'alan nabiyyyi min harajin feemaa faradal laahu lahoo sunnatal laahi fil lazeena khalaw min qabl; Wa-kaana amrul laahi qadaram maqdooraa

words.id: orang-orang yang||(mereka) menyampaikan||risalah-risalah||Allah||dan mereka takut kepada-Nya||dan tidak||mereka takut||seseorang/apapun||kecuali/selain||Allah||cukuplah||bagi Allah||pembuat perhitungan
words.en: Those who||convey||(the) Messages||(of) Allah||and fear Him||and (do) not||fear||anyone||except||Allah||And sufficient is Allah||And sufficient is Allah||(as) a Reckoner

translations.text: Allazeena yuballighoona Risaalaatil laahi Wa-yakhshaw-nahoo Wa-laa yakkhshawna ahadan illal laah; Wa-kafaa billaahi Haseebaa

words.id: tidak||adalah||Muhammad||bapak||seorang||dari||laki-laki diantara kamu||tetapi||dan rasul||Allah||dan penutup||para nabi||dan adalah||Allah||dengan semuanya/setiap||sesuatu||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: Not||is||Muhammad||(the) father||(of) anyone||of||your men||but||(he is the) Messenger||(of) Allah||and Seal||(of) the Prophets||And Allah is||And Allah is||of every||thing||All-Knower

translations.text: Maa kaana Muhammmadun abaaa ahadim mir rijaalikum Wa-laakir Rasoolal laahi Wa-Khaataman Nabiyyeen; Wa-kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in 'Aleema

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||ingatlah||Allah||ingat||banyak
words.en: O (you who)||(O) you who||believe||Remember||Allah||(with) remembrance||much

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanuz kurul laaha zikran kaseera

words.id: dan bertashbihlah||diwaktu pagi||dan petang
words.en: And glorify Him||morning||and evening

translations.text: Wa-sabbihoohu bukratanw Wa-aseela

words.id: Dia||yang||memberi rahmat||atas kalian||dan malaikat-malaikat-Nya||karena Dia hendak mengeluarkan kamu||dari||kegelapan||kepada||cahaya||dan adalah||kepada orang-orang mukmin||Maha Penyayang
words.en: He||(is) the One Who||sends His blessings||upon you||and His Angels||so that He may bring you out||from||the darkness[es]||to||the light||And He is||to the believers||Merciful

translations.text: Huwal lazee yusallee alaikum Wa-malaaa'ikatuhoo liyukhrijakum minaz zulumaati ilan noor Wa-kaana bilmu'mineena Raheemaa

words.id: penghormatan mereka||hari||mereka menemui-Nya||salam/sejahtera||dan Dia menyediakan||bagi mereka||pahala||mulia
words.en: Their greetings||(on the) Day||they will meet Him||(will be) Peace||and He has prepared||for them||a reward||noble

translations.text: Tahiyyatuhum Yawma yalqawnahoo salaamunw Wa-a'adda lahum ajran kareemaa

words.id: hai||nabi||sesungguhnya Kami||Kami mengutusmu||menjadi saksi||dan pembawa kabar gembira||dan pemberi peringatan
words.en: O Prophet||O Prophet||Indeed, We||have sent you||(as) a witness||and a bearer of glad tidings||and (as) a warner

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu innaaa arsalnaaka shaahidanw Wa-mubashshiranw Wa-nazeeraa

words.id: dan penyeru||kepada||Allah||dengan izin-Nya||dan pelita||bersinar/terang
words.en: And as one who invites||to||Allah||by His permission||and (as) a lamp||illuminating

translations.text: Wa-daa'iyan ilal laahi bi-iznihee Wa-siraajam muneeraa

words.id: dan berilah kabar gembira||orang-orang yang beriman||bahwa sesungguhnya||bagi mereka||dari||Allah||karunia||besar
words.en: And give glad tidings||(to) the believers||that||for them||(is) from||Allah||a Bounty||great

translations.text: Wa-bashshiril mu'mineena bi-annna lahum minal laahi fadlan kabeera

words.id: dan janganlah||mengikuti||orang-orang kafir||dan orang-orang munafik||dan biarkan||gangguan mereka||dan bertakwalah||atas/kepada||Allah||dan cukuplah||Allah||tempat berserah diri/pelindung
words.en: And (do) not||obey||the disbelievers||and the hypocrites||and disregard||their harm||and put your trust||in||Allah||And sufficient is Allah||And sufficient is Allah||(as) a Trustee

translations.text: Wa-laa tuti'il kaafireena walmunaafiqeena Wa-da 'azaahum Wa-tawakkal 'alal laah; Wa-kafaa billaahi Wakeelaa

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||apabila||kamu mengawini||perempuan-perempuan yang beriman||kemudian||kamu menceraikan mereka||dari||sebelum||bahwa||kamu menyentuh/menggauli mereka||maka tidak||bagi kalian||atas mereka||dari||iddah||kamu menghitungnya||maka berilah mereka mut'ah||dan lepaskan/ceraikan mereka||perceraian||baik
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||When||you marry||believing women||and then||divorce them||before||before||[that]||you have touched them||then not||for you||on them||any||waiting period||(to) count concerning them||So provide for them||and release them||(with) a release||good

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa nakahtumul mu'minaati summa tallaqtu-moohunna min qabli an tamas-soohunna famaa lakum alaihinna min iddatin ta'taddoonahaa famatti'oohunna Wa-sarri-hoohunna saraahan jameelaa

words.id: hai||Nabi||sesungguhnya Kami||Kami telah menghalalkan||bagimu||istri-istrimu||yang||kamu telah berikan||maskawin mereka||dan apa||yang dimiliki||tangan kananmu (hamba sahaya)||dari apa||memberi/mengkaruniakan||Allah||atasmu||dan anak-anak perempuanmu||saudara perempuan bapakmu||dan anak-anak perempuan||saudara perempuan bapakmu||dan anak-anak perempuan||saudara laki-laki bapakmu||dan anak-anak perempuan||saudara perempuan ibumu||yang||mereka hijrah||bersamamu||dan wanita||yang beriman||jika||ia menyerahkan||dirinya||kepada nabi||jika||menghendaki||nabi||bahwa||dia akan mengawininya||pengkhususan||bagimu||dari||selain||orang-orang yang beriman||sesungguhnya||kami telah mengetahui||apa||yang kami fardukan/wajibkan||atas mereka||pada||istri-istri mereka||dan tidak||yang dimiliki||tangan kanan mereka (hamba sahaya)||supaya tidak||adalah||atasmu||kesempitan||dan adalah||Allah||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: O Prophet||O Prophet||Indeed, We||[We] have made lawful||to you||your wives||(to) whom||you have given||their bridal money||and whom||you rightfully possess||you rightfully possess||from those (whom)||Allah has given||Allah has given||to you||and (the) daughters||(of) your paternal uncles||and (the) daughters||(of) your paternal aunts||and (the) daughters||(of) your maternal uncles||and (the) daughters||(of) your maternal aunts||who||emigrated||with you||and a woman||believing||if||she gives||herself||to the Prophet||if||wishes||the Prophet||to||marry her||only||for you||excluding||excluding||the believers||Certainly||We know||what||We have made obligatory||upon them||concerning||their wives||and whom||they rightfully possess||they rightfully possess||that not||should be||on you||any discomfort||And Allah is||And Allah is||Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu innaaa ahlalnaa laka azwaa-jakal laatee aataiyta ujoora-hunna Wa-maa malakat yameenuka mimmaaa afaaa'al laahu alaika Wa-banaati ammika Wa-banaati ammaatika Wa-banaati khaalika Wa-banaati khaalaa-tikal laatee haajarna ma'aka wamra`atan mu'minatan inw wahabat nafsahaa lin-Nabiyyi in araadan Nabiyyu aien yastan-kihahaa khaalisatan laka min doonil mu'mineen; qad alimnaa maa faradnaa alaihim feee azwaajihim Wa-maa malakat aimaanuhum li-kailaa yakoona alaika haraj; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheema

words.id: engkau boleh menangguhkan||siapa||kamu kehendaki||dari/diantara mereka||kamu beri perlindungan/menggauli||kepadamu||siapa||yang dikehendaki||dan siapa||kamu ingini||dan siapa/orang||kamu sisihkan||maka tidak||berdosa||atasmu||seperti itulah||lebih dekat||bahwa||menyejukkan||mata mereka||dan tidak||mereka tidak merasa sedih||dan mereka rela||dengan apa-apa||kamu telah berikan kepada mereka||semuanya||dan Allah||mengetahui||apa||pada||hati kamu||dan adalah||Allah||Maha Mengetahui||Maha Penyantun
words.en: You may defer||whom||you will||of them||or you may take||to yourself||whom||you will||And whoever||you desire||of those whom||you (had) set aside||then (there is) no||blame||upon you||That||(is) more suitable||that||may be cooled||their eyes||and not||they grieve||and they may be pleased||with what||you have given them||all of them||And Allah||knows||what||(is) in||your hearts||And Allah is||And Allah is||All-Knower||Most Forbearing

translations.text: Turjee man tashaaa'u minhunna Wa-tu'weee ilaika man tashaaa'u Wa-manib ta-ghaita mimman 'azalta falaa junaaha alaik; zaalika adnaaa an taqarra a'yunuhunna Wa-laa yahzanna Wa-yardaina bimaa aataitahunna kulluhunn; wal-laahu ya'lamu maa fee quloo-bikum; Wa-kaanal laahu 'Aleeman haleemaa

words.id: tidak||halal||bagimu||perempuan||dari||sesudah||dan tidak||bahwa||boleh kamu mengganti||dengan mereka||dari||istri-istri||walaupun||menarik hatimu||kebaikan/kecantikan mereka||kecuali||apa||yang dimiliki||tangan kananmu||dan adalah||Allah||atas||segala/semua||sesuatu||Maha Pengawas
words.en: (It is) not||lawful||for you||(to marry) women||after (this)||after (this)||and not||to||exchange||them||for||(other) wives||even if||pleases you||their beauty||except||whom||you rightfully possess||you rightfully possess||And Allah is||And Allah is||over||all||things||an Observer

translations.text: Laa yahillu lakan nisaaa'u mim ba'du Wa-laaa an tabaddala bihinna min azwaajinw Wa-law ajabaka husnuhunna illaa maa malakat yameenukk; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'ir Raqeeba

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||tidak||kamu memasuki||rumah||nabi||kecuali||bahwa||diizinkan||bagi kalian||kecuali||makanan||tidak||menunggu-nunggu||sesungguhnya||dan adalah||apabila||kamu diundang||maka masuklah||maka apabila||kamu selesai makan||maka bertebaranlah/keluarlah||dan jangan||beramah tamah/asyik||untuk percakapan||sesungguhnya||yang demikian itu||adalah||menyakiti/mengganggu||nabi||lalu dia malu||dari kamu/kepadamu||dan Allah||tidak||malu||dari||kebenaran||dan apabila||kamu meminta kepada mereka||satu keperluan||maka mintalah kepada mereka||dari||belakang||tabir||demikian itu||lebih mensucikan||bagi hatimu||dan hati mereka||dan tidak||adalah||bagi kalian||bahwa||kamu menyakiti/mengganggu||utusan/rasul||Allah||dan tidak||bahwa||kamu mengawini||istri-istrinya||dari||sesudahnya||selama-lamanya||sesungguhnya||demikian itu||adalah||disisi||Allah||besar
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||(Do) not||enter||(the) houses||(of) the Prophet||except||when||permission is given||to you||for||a meal||without||awaiting||its preparation||But||when||you are invited||then enter||and when||you have eaten||then disperse||and not||seeking to remain||for a conversation||Indeed||that||was||troubling||the Prophet||and he is shy||of (dismissing) you||But Allah||is not shy||is not shy||of||the truth||And when||you ask them||for something||then ask them||from||behind||a screen||That||(is) purer||for your hearts||and their hearts||And not||is||for you||that||you trouble||(the) Messenger||(of) Allah||and not||that||you should marry||his wives||after him||after him||ever||Indeed||that||is||near||Allah||an enormity

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tadkhuloo bu-yootan Nabiyyi illaaa aien yu'zana lakum ilaa ta'aamin ghaira naazireena inaahu Wa-laakin izaa du'eetum fadkhuloo fa-izaa ta'imtum fantashiroo Wa-laa mustaaniseena lihadees; inna zaalikum kaana yu'zin Nabiyya fa-yastahyee minkum wallaahu laa yastahyee minal haqq; Wa-izaa sa-altumoohunna mataa'an fas'aloohunna minw waraaa'i hijaab; zaalikum atharu liquloobikum Wa-quloobihinn; Wa-maa kaana lakum an tu'zoo Rasoolal laahi Wa-laaa an tankihooo azwaajahoo mim ba'diheee abadaa; inna zaalikum kaana indal laahi 'azeema

words.id: jika||kamu melahirkan||sesuatu||atau||kamu menyembunyikannya||maka sesungguhnya||Allah||adalah||dengan segala/tiap-tiap||sesuatu||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: Whether||you reveal||a thing||or||conceal it||indeed||Allah||is||of all||things||All-Knower

translations.text: in tubdoo shai'an aw tukhfoohu fa-innal laaha kaana bikulli shai'in 'Aleemaa

words.id: tidak||berdosa||atas mereka||pada||bapak-bapak mereka||dan tidak||anak-anak laki mereka||dan tidak||saudara laki-laki mereka||dan tidak||anak-anak laki-laki mereka||saudara laki-laki mereka||dan tidak||anak laki-laki||saudara perempuan mereka||dan tidak||saudara perempuan mereka||dan tidak||apa-apa||yang dimiliki||tangan kanan mereka (hamba sahaya)||dan bertakwalah kamu||Allah||sesungguhnya||Allah||adalah||atas||segala||sesuatu||Maha Menyaksikan
words.en: (There is) no||blame||upon them||concerning||their fathers||and not||their sons||and not||their brothers||and not||sons||(of) their brothers||and not||sons||(of) their sisters||and not||their women||and not||what||they rightfully possess||they rightfully possess||And fear||Allah||Indeed||Allah||is||over||all||things||a Witness

translations.text: Laa junaaha alaihinna feee aabaaa'ihinna Wa-laaa abnaaa'ihinna Wa-laaa ikhwaanihinnna Wa-laaa abnaaa'i ikhwaanihinna Wa-laaa abnaaa'i akhawaatihinna Wa-laa nisaaa'i-hinna Wa-laa Maa malakat aimaanuhunn; wattaqeenal laah; innal laaha kaana 'alaa kulli shai'in Shaheedaa

words.id: sesungguhnya||Allah||dan malaikat-malaikatnya||menyampaikan/mohon rahmat||atas||nabi||wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||mohonkan rahmat||atasnya||dan mohonkan keselamatan||kesejahteraan/penghormatan
words.en: Indeed||Allah||and His Angels||send blessings||upon||the Prophet||O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||Send blessings||on him||and greet him||(with) greetings

translations.text: innal laaha Wa-malaaa'i-katahoo yusalloona 'alan Nabiyy; yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo salloo alaihi Wa-sallimoo tasleemaa

words.id: sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||(mereka)menyakiti/mencaci||Allah||dan rasulnya||mengutuk mereka||Allah||pada||dunia||dan akherat||dan Dia menyediakan||bagi mereka||azab||yang menghinakan
words.en: Indeed||those who||annoy||Allah||and His Messenger||Allah has cursed them||Allah has cursed them||in||the world||and the Hereafter||and has prepared||for them||a punishment||humiliating

translations.text: innal lazeena yu'zoonal laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo la'anahumul laahu fid dunyaa wal-Aakhirati Wa-a'adda lahum 'azaabam muheenaa

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka) menyakiti||orang-orang laki-laki beriman||orang-orang perempuan beriman||dengan tanpa||apa||mereka perbuat||maka sesungguhnya||mereka membawa/memikul||kebohongan||dan dosa||yang nyata
words.en: And those who||harm||the believing men||and the believing women||for other than||what||they have earned||then certainly||they bear||false accusation||and sin||manifest

translations.text: Wallazeena yu'zoonal mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati bighairi ma'ak tasaboo faqadih tamaloo buhtaananw Wa-ismam mubeenaa

words.id: hai||nabi||katakanlah||kepada istri-istrimu||dan anak-anak perempuanmu||dan perempuan||yang beriman||mereka menutupi||atas mereka||dari||baju panjang mereka||demikian itu||lebih dekat/mudah||bahwa||mereka dikenal||maka tidak||mereka diganggu||dan adalah||Allah||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: O Prophet||O Prophet||Say||to your wives||and your daughters||and (the) women||(of) the believers||to bring down||over themselves||of||their outer garments||That||(is) more suitable||that||they should be known||and not||harmed||And is||Allah||Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyyuhan Nabiyyu qul li-azwaajika Wa-banaatika Wa-nisaaa'il mu'mineena yudneena alaihinna min jalaabee-bihinn; zaalika adnaaa aien yu'rafna falaa yu'zain; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

words.id: sesungguhnya jika||tidak||berhenti||orang-orang munafik||dan orang-orang yang||pada||hati mereka||penyakit||dan orang-orang yang menyiarkan fitnah||pada||Madinah/kota||niscaya Kami perintahkan kamu menyerang||dengan mereka||kemudian||tidak||mereka jadi tetanggamu||didalamnya||kecuali||sedikit
words.en: If||(do) not||cease||the hypocrites||and those who||in||their hearts||(is) a disease||and those who spread rumors||in||the city||We will let you overpower them||We will let you overpower them||then||not||they will remain your neighbors||therein||except||(for) a little

translations.text: La'il lam yantahil munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradunw walmur-jifoona fil madeenati lanughri-yannaka bihim summa laa yujaawiroonaka feehaaa illaa qaleela

words.id: mereka terkutuk||dimana saja||mereka dijumpai||mereka ditangkap||dan mereka dibunuh||pembunuhan yang dahsyat
words.en: Accursed||wherever||they are found||they are seized||and massacred completely||and massacred completely

translations.text: Mal'ooneena ainamaa suqifoo ukhizoo Wa-quttiloo taqteelaa

words.id: sunnah/ketetapan||Allah||pada||orang-orang yang||terdahulu||dari||sebelum||dan tidak||mendapati||bagi ketetapan||Allah||perubahan
words.en: (Such is the) Way||(of) Allah||with||those who||passed away||before||before||and never||you will find||in (the) Way||(of) Allah||any change

translations.text: Sunnatal laahi fil lazeena khalaw min qablu Wa-lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelaa

words.id: akan bertanya kepadamu||manusia||dari/tentang||kiamat||katakanlah||sesungguhnya||pengetahuannya||disisi||Allah||dan tidak||akan memberitakan kepadamu||boleh jadi/barangkali||hari kiamat||adalah||dekat
words.en: Ask you||the people||about||the Hour||Say||Only||its knowledge||(is) with||Allah||And what||will make you know||Perhaps||the Hour||is||near

translations.text: Yas'alukan naasu anis Saa'ati qul innamaa ilmuhaa indal laah; Wa-maa yudreeka la'allas Saa'ata takoonu qareebaa

words.id: sesungguhnya||Allah||mengutuk||orang-orang kafir||dan Dia menyediakan||bagi mereka||api yang menyala-nyala
words.en: Indeed||Allah||has cursed||the disbelievers||and has prepared||for them||a Blaze

translations.text: innal laaha la'anal kaafireena Wa-a'adda lahum sa'eeraa

words.id: mereka kekal||di dalamnya||selama-lamanya||tidak||mereka mengambil/mendapatkan||pelindung||dan tidak||penolong
words.en: Abiding||therein||forever||not||they will find||any protector||and not||any helper

translations.text: Khaalideena feehaaa abadaa, laa yajidoona waliyyanw Wa-laa naseeraa

words.id: hari||dibolak-balik||muka mereka||pada||neraka||mereka berkata||seandainya||kami taat||Allah||dan kami taat||rasul
words.en: (The) Day||will be turned about||their faces||in||the Fire||they will say||O we wish||we (had) obeyed||Allah||and obeyed||the Messenger!

translations.text: Yawma tuqallabu wujoohuhum fin Naari yaqooloona yaa-laitanaaa ata'nal laaha Wa-ata'nar Rasoolaa

words.id: dan berkata||Tuhanku||sesungguhnya||kami mentaati||pemimpin-pemimpin kami||dan pembesar-pembesar kami||lalu mereka menyesatkan kami||jalan
words.en: And they will say||Our Lord!||Indeed we||[we] obeyed||our chiefs||and our great men||and they misled us||(from) the Way

translations.text: Wa-qaaloo Rabbanaaa innaaa ata'naa saadatanaa Wa-kubaraaa'anaa fa-adalloonas sabeelaa

words.id: Tuhan kami||berilah mereka||dua kali lipat||dari||azab||dan kutuklah mereka||kutukan||besar
words.en: Our Lord!||Give them||double||[of]||punishment||and curse them||(with) a curse||great

translations.text: Rabbanaaa aatihim di'fai-ni minal azaabi wal'anhum la-nan kabeera

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||janganlah||kalian menjadi||seperti orang-orang yang||(mereka) menyakiti||Musa||maka membebaskannya||Allah||dari apa||mereka katakan||dan adalah||disisi||Allah||terhormat
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||(Do) not||be||like those who||annoyed||Musa||then Allah cleared him||then Allah cleared him||of what||they said||And he was||near||Allah||honorable

translations.text: Yaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanoo las takoonoo kalla-zeena aazaw Moosaa fa-barra-ahul laahu mimmaa qaaloo; Wa-kaana indal laahi wajeehaa

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||bertakwalah||Allah||dan katakanlah||perkataan||benar
words.en: O you who believe||O you who believe||O you who believe||Fear||Allah||and speak||a word||right

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha Wa-qooloo qawlan sadeedaa

words.id: Dia akan memperbaiki||bagi kalian||amalan kamu||dan mengampuni||bagi kalian||dosa-dosa kamu||dan siapa||mentaati||Allah||dan rasulnya||maka sungguh||ia mendapat keuntungan/kemenangan||keuntungan/kemenangan||besar
words.en: He will amend||for you||your deeds||and forgive||you||your sins||And whoever||obeys||Allah||and His Messenger||certainly||has attained||an attainment||great

translations.text: Yuslih lakum a'maalakum Wa-yaghfir lakum zunoobakum; Wa-mai yuti'il laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo faqad faaza fawzan 'azeemaa

words.id: sesungguhnya||Kami mengemukakan||amanat||atas/kepada||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan gunung-gunung||maka mereka enggan||bahwa||memikulnya||dan mereka merasa takut||dari padanya||dan memikulnya||manusia||sesungguhnya dia||adalah||amat zalim||amat bodoh
words.en: Indeed||[We] offered||the Trust||to||the heavens||and the earth||and the mountains||but they refused||to||bear it||and they feared||from it||but bore it||the man||Indeed he||was||very unjust||very ignorant

translations.text: innaa 'aradnal amaanata 'alas samaawaati walardi wal-jibaali fa-abaina aien yahmil-nahaa Wa-ashfaqna minhaa Wa-hamalahal insaanu innahoo kaana zalooman jahoolaa

words.id: karena akan menyiksa||Allah||orang-orang munafik laki-laki||dan orang munafik perempuan||dan orang musyrik laki-laki||dan orang musyrik perempuan||dan akan menerima taubat||Allah||atas||orang beriman laki-laki||orang beriman perempuan||dan adalah||Allah||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: So that Allah may punish||So that Allah may punish||the hypocrite men||and the hypocrite women||and the polytheist men||and the polytheist women||and Allah will turn (in Mercy)||and Allah will turn (in Mercy)||to||the believing men||and the believing women||And Allah is||And Allah is||Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Liyu-'azzibal laahul munaafiqeena wal-munaafiqaati walmushrikeena wal-mushrikaati Wa-yatoobal laahu 'alal mu'mineena walmu'minaat; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheema
